name: CorridorVR
description:
You stand in the middle of intersecting corridors. Zombies could be down any one, or more...

Choose your weapons, and fight for your life, as you're surrounded by relentless undead!

IMPORTANT: THIS IS AN HTC VIVE GAME - YOU CANNOT PLAY WITHOUT A VIVE HEADSET AND TRACKED CONTROLLERS.

Update 1.0b:
  • Added Crawler type
  • Fixed global leaderboards, crash on close, zombie lighting
Game now free/pay-what-you-want.

Initial release: 3 weapons, 2 zombie types (walkers, runners)

Known bugs: Crash on quit (only occurs on exit, so not a big issue).
